title: account hacked
body: me being the idiot that i am gave my username and password to a web site. i had just hit silver 4 and am pissed. the account is also linked to an old email that i don't have the password for. maybe if league could go hack back into my account and get if for me that would be great. Ipandamn2i. Ps this is my smurf

replies.body: The best thing you can do is to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!  Fill out as much information about your account and one of our Account Recovery Specialists will hopefully recover it ASAP!
